rows.label: qst202302_msg001
rows.name:
But even if we say we're going
to find a tough opponent, does
anyone have any leads?

rows.label: qst202302_msg002
rows.name: Nope.

rows.label: qst202302_msg003
rows.name: Not a one.

rows.label: qst202302_msg004
rows.name: None, mo.

rows.label: qst202302_msg005
rows.name: Hmm, no...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202302_msg006
rows.name:
Hey, wait a minute! You
have to know of at least
one strong one, right?

rows.label: qst202302_msg007
rows.name:
People don't usually pay
attention to that sort of
thing, so I doubt it.

rows.label: qst202302_msg008
rows.name:
Besides, finding an opponent strong
enough to satisfy Yaegiri is setting
the bar pretty high, isn't it?

rows.label: qst202302_msg009
rows.name: That's true...

rows.label: qst202302_msg010
rows.name:
Whaat?! Don't give up before
we even start looking!

rows.label: qst202302_msg011
rows.name:
Well...[ML:Dash ] it's not like I don't
have any leads at all...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202302_msg012
rows.name: Hikari, really?!

rows.label: qst202302_msg013
rows.name:
It's just a story from a long time
ago, something I heard as a rumor.

rows.label: qst202302_msg014
rows.name:
Anything is fine at
this point! Tell me!

rows.label: qst202302_msg015
rows.name:
A long, long time ago, there
was apparently a king of
beasts with immense power.

rows.label: qst202302_msg016
rows.name:
This king of beasts was so strong
that no one could defeat it...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202302_msg017
rows.name:
The people of the past sacrificed
much, and were only just barely
able to seal it away.

rows.label: qst202302_msg018
rows.name:
That's it, that's the one!
That's a worthy opponent!

rows.label: qst202302_msg019
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]So, where is this thing?

rows.label: qst202302_msg020
rows.name: I don't know.

rows.label: qst202302_msg021
rows.name:
Huh?! After getting my hopes
up like that, you can't just
say you don't know!

rows.label: qst202302_msg022
rows.name:
I don't know what I don't
know. It can't be helped.

rows.label: qst202302_msg023
rows.name:
If Hikari's memory is
correct, there might be
a record of it somewhere.

rows.label: qst202302_msg024
rows.name:
Then maybe we should check
the library in Teos Aure?

rows.label: qst202302_msg025
rows.name:
They've got a ton of old
records stored there.

rows.label: qst202302_msg026
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst202302_msg027
rows.name: For real.

rows.label: qst202302_msg028
rows.name:
Then there's no choice but
to go! Thanks, Zeke, Saika!

rows.label: qst202302_msg029
rows.name:
As thanks, I'll let you fight
the sealed monster with me!

rows.label: qst202302_msg030
rows.name: I'll pass on that reward!

rows.label: qst202302_msg031
rows.name:
All right! Everyone,
let's go to Luxuria!
